item.title: OpenAI/GPT: Returning consistent/valid JSON from a prompt
item.description: When using OpenAI it can be tricky to get it to return a consistent response for a prompt. In this blog post, we’re going to learn how to use functions to return a consistent JSON format for a basic sentiment analysis prompt. I’ve created a video showing how to do this on my YouTube channel, Learn Data with Mark, so if you prefer to consume content through that medium, I’ve embedded it below:
